attributes.action: Reduce the amount of Time / Red Tape to remove immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the vast cost and burden on our social resources such as health care / Housing and benefit system not to mention the social unrest this problem is causing among all communities. 

We respectfully ask that the processes and systems in place to be drastically reviewed and reduced to remove illegal immigrants far more effectively than the current system (Even if it makes us unpopular within the EU).

We also ask that no more amnesty be given to illegal immigrants (just because they avoided the system for a period of time).
We also ask that any Illegal immigrant found guilty of a crime be removed without delay.
